author: brane
msg: Use "" instead of "svn:this_dir" in the entries file.
entry name is "svn:this_dir", change it to SVN_WC_ENTRIES_THIS_DIR.

author: brane
msg: Some tweaks and polish for psvn, among them:
-- make it look nice on a dark background
-- align filenames correctly if revision numbers or author
names are wider than the default
-- parse the "needs update" flag from "svn st -uv"
-- add a short display mode for the "needs update" flag
Add variants for a dark background.
New variables for controlling the file list display.
Track the maximum width of the revision and author fields, then
(svn-insert-line-in-status-buffer): Support both long and short variants
of the displayed "need update" flag. Highlight only the version and
if we're on a status line before moving the cursor to the default column.
Also change all instances of "Svn" to either "SVN" or "svn", as

author: julianfoad
msg: Correct an example of svn's output.

author: julianfoad
msg: Change the call sequence "apr_file_close, svn_error_create" to
libsvn_*.  This complements the changes made in revision 7660.

author: kfogel
msg: Mike pointed out some niceties of XML escaping:
(upd_change_xxx_prop): XML-escape the value if not going to encode
